verses.text: The \w land|strong="H6723"\w* that was desolate \w and|strong="H6723"\w* impassable shall be \w glad|strong="H7797"\w*, \w and|strong="H6723"\w* the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* shall \w rejoice|strong="H1523"\w*, \w and|strong="H6723"\w* shall flourish like the lily.

\w It|strong="H5414"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w bud|strong="H6524"\w* \w forth|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* blossom, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H1523"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w joy|strong="H7442"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* praise: \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Libanus \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*: \w the|strong="H7200"\w* beauty \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w Carmel|strong="H3760"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Saron, \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* beauty \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w Strengthen|strong="H2388"\w* ye \w the|strong="H2388"\w* \w feeble|strong="H3782"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* confirm \w the|strong="H2388"\w* \w weak|strong="H3782"\w* \w knees|strong="H1290"\w*.

\w Say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* fainthearted: \w Take|strong="H2388"\w* \w courage|strong="H2388"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w*: \w behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w your|strong="H0935"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w revenge|strong="H5359"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w recompense|strong="H1576"\w*: \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w himself|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w* \w you|strong="H0935"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0227"\w* shall \w the|strong="H0227"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H0227"\w* \w blind|strong="H5787"\w* \w be|strong="H0241"\w* \w opened|strong="H6605"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H0227"\w* \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H0227"\w* \w deaf|strong="H2795"\w* shall \w be|strong="H0241"\w* unstopped.

\w Then|strong="H0227"\w* \w shall|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w lame|strong="H6455"\w* \w man|strong="H6455"\w* \w leap|strong="H1801"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* hart, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* dumb \w shall|strong="H4325"\w* \w be|strong="H4325"\w* free: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* are \w broken|strong="H1234"\w* \w out|strong="H1234"\w* \w in|strong="H0227"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w desert|strong="H6160"\w*, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w streams|strong="H5158"\w* \w in|strong="H0227"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4325"\w* \w that|strong="H4325"\w* \w which|strong="H4325"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* dry \w land|strong="H8273"\w*, \w shall|strong="H7070"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w pool|strong="H0098"\w*, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w thirsty|strong="H6774"\w* \w land|strong="H8273"\w* \w springs|strong="H4002"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*. \w In|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* dens where dragons dwell before, \w shall|strong="H7070"\w* rise \w up|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* verdure \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w reed|strong="H7070"\w* \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* bulrush.

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w path|strong="H1870"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*: \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* unto \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* straight \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, \w so|strong="H1980"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w fools|strong="H0191"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w err|strong="H8582"\w* therein.

\w No|strong="H3808"\w* \w lion|strong="H0738"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H1961"\w* mischievous \w beast|strong="H2416"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w by|strong="H1980"\w* \w it|strong="H8033"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*: \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5927"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w redeemed|strong="H6299"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* Sion \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w praise|strong="H5769"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w joy|strong="H8057"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w*: \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w obtain|strong="H5381"\w* \w joy|strong="H8057"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w gladness|strong="H8057"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w sorrow|strong="H3015"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* mourning \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w flee|strong="H5127"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w*.
